title: please help! i cant play!
body:
hi, an update was due so i did it and left the computer on! when i came back on computer later that night i tried opening league of legends this image came up! 

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Y2h9Qo_MupviFsXpSpCTEjHCWAK04lIXCPQcX628i_S0iGB-hiZ322cFNUuKQ8mmcvfk1A=s152

after this i tried opening it 500 times and its always like this! i left it over night but it doesnt change!

replies.body: I may be able to help here!  It looks like the patcher wants to check your files and prep for updates but it's getting blocked.  Check your antivirus and firewall settings as well as the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
yes its working again! thank you very much!! :)
